member.name: P:PayOS.PayOSOptions.TimeoutMs

member.name: P:PayOS.PayOSOptions.LogLevel
member.summary: Log level for the PayOS client Can be overridden by PAYOS_LOG environment variable Supported values: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical, None Defaults to Information for better debugging experience

member.summary: Create a batch payout
member.param: The details of batch payout to be created
A unique key for ensuring idempotency. Use a UUID or other high-entropy string so that retries of the same request are recognized and duplicated payouts are prevented
member.returns: A promise that resolves to the newly created Payout object

member.name: M:PayOS.Resources.Webhooks.Webhooks.ConfirmAsync(System.String,PayOS.Models.RequestOptions{PayOS.Models.Webhooks.ConfirmWebhookRequest})
member.summary: Validate and register a webhook URL with payOS. payOS will test the webhook endpoint by sending a validation request to it. If the webhook responds correctly, it will be registered for payment notifications.
member.param: Your webhook endpoint URL that will receive payment notifications
member.returns: The confirmed webhook URL result
member.exception: When webhook URL is invalid or validation fails
